Bugs & Questions¶

You can file bugs in our github issues tracker, ask questions on our gitter chat. Or check the FAQ section on the documentation.

FAQ¶

http://passpie.readthedocs.org/en/latest/faq.html

Passpie

Passpie is a command-line password manager with a colorful interface.
